UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the SheRide application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, matching Firebase Auth UID.

drivingLicenseId.description: URL to the user's uploaded Driving License ID (optional).

profileVerified.description: Indicates if the user's profile is verified by an admin.

PickupRequest.title: PickupRequest
PickupRequest.description: Represents a ride offer created by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup request.

userProfileId.description: UID of the user creating the request.

dateTime.description: ISO string of the ride's date and time.

status.description: The current status of the request (e.g., 'open', 'matched', 'cancelled').

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was created.

ServiceRequest.title: ServiceRequest
ServiceRequest.description: Represents a ride request created by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the service request.

userProfileId.description: UID of the user creating the request.

dateTime.description: ISO string of the service's date and time.

maxAmountWillingToPay.description: Maximum amount the passenger is willing to pay.

status.description: The current status of the request (e.g., 'open', 'matched', 'cancelled').

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was created.

Ride.title: Ride
Ride.description: Represents a confirmed ride between users.

driverId.description: UID of the user who is driving.

passengerId.description: UID of the user who is the passenger.

pickupRequestId.description: Reference to the PickupRequest, if the ride originated from one.

serviceRequestId.description: Reference to the ServiceRequest, if the ride originated from one.

participantIds.description: Array containing the UIDs of both the rider and the passenger.

status.description: Status of the ride (requested, accepted, confirmed, completed, cancelled).

sharedCost.description: The agreed shared cost between the rider and passenger.

dateTime.description: ISO string of the confirmed ride's date and time.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the ride was created.

fromLocation.description: The starting location of the ride.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat conversation between users.

participantIds.description: Array containing the UIDs of all participants.

messages.description: Array of message objects in the chat.

lastMessageAt.description: Timestamp of the last message sent.

SosAlert.title: SosAlert
SosAlert.description: Represents an SOS alert triggered by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SOS alert.

userProfileId.description: UID of the user who triggered the alert.

rideId.description: Reference to the Ride during which the alert was triggered.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the alert was triggered.

location.description: Location of the user when the alert was triggered (e.g., coordinates).

/pickupRequests/{pickupRequestId}.description: Top-level collection for all ride offers (pickup requests).

/serviceRequests/{serviceRequestId}.description: Top-level collection for all ride requests (service requests).

/rides/{rideId}.description: Stores confirmed ride information, accessible by participants.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores chat conversations between two or more users.

/sos_alerts/{sosAlertId}.description: Stores SOS alerts triggered by users during rides.
